bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, women's tubesets, women's performance geometry, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, threaded BB

Specialized Women's Comp, alloy, shallow drop
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Espoir Sport w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x23c
